column5: Anyone have any tips or hot spots for salmon on the Nottawasaga ? I’ve tried the fishing park in angus but it gets too crowded. Thanks!

Sorry, but you'll probably find nobody on this board will post hotspots to anyone, specially someone with a 1st post and not even an introduction. Nothing personal against you, just the way things are.

Interesting approach. I'm thinking that looking for quiet spots by asking about them on a large open forum would be quite counter productive.. The most successful Salmon and Trout anglers are very good at exploring, finding their own water and keeping their mouth shut ? Josh
But you post pictures of dead grass or rocks with a fish. I can tell you where to find tomatoes this weekend!
I have seen more tomatoes today then I need to.  . I went to 4 stores. No shepherds. ?  I did see frozen steelhead fillets. One side , thin sliced,25 bucks. LOL

Every garage door is UP in woody this weekend!  keep your shorts on the  peppers, I’ll let you know when they are ready. Meanwhile, fish the Notty and post grass/rock pictures. And help Terry with the truck.

Terry, the guy who gets up late and knows the Notty like the back of his hand. he knows Salmon fishing spots, takes rock/grass pictures better than you. You never take him, he would show you his spots!
1st trip out this  fall. Get there well before anyone see,s you walking in. Had a couple of hours this morning. 2nd toss, this one smoked a Mepps spinner. Perfect eater size.
I knew that was coming lol. I told you so!
Your sure livin the life my friend !!

To be fair here Fez, you did ask a loaded question. Tips, some will give, SPOTS, aint going to happen. I have lived up here for over 25 years. I walked and trench through 100,s of miles of bush to find spots. Alone, and with good friends. Will I share these spots? Yes, but with only true loyal friends. Get yer boots on and get marching. Never know, you might find that one spot. Good fishing to you.
Wrong spot. That is the other spot. LOL
Tell me you smoked that fish using the SS whisker lol!!!
